Verses: 2 mullugalukkulle Leelipushpam Eppadiyirukkiradho, Appadiye Kumaaraththigalukkulle Enakkup Piriyamaanavalum Irukkiraal.
3 kaattumarangalukkulle Kichchilimaram Eppadiyirukkiradho, Appadiye Kumaararukkulle En Nesar Irukkiraar; Adhin Nizhalile Vaanjaiyaai Utkaarugiren, Adhin Kani En Vaaikku Madhuramaayirukkiradhu.
4 ennai Virundhusaalaikku Azhaiththukkonduponaar; Enmel Parandha Avarudaiya Kodi Nesame.
5 dhraatcharasaththaal Ennaith Thetrungal, Kichchilippazhangalaal Ennai Aatrungal; Nesaththaal Sogamadaindhirukkiren.
6 avar Idadhukai En Thalaiyinkeezh Irukkiradhu; Avar Valadhukai Ennai Anaiththukkollugiradhu.
7 erusalemin Kumaaraththigale! Enakkup Piriyamaanavalukku Manadhaagumattum, Neengal Avalai Vizhikkappannaamalum Ezhuppaamalumirukkumpadi Velimaangalmelum Veliyin Maraigalmelum Ungalai Aanaiyidugiren.
8 idhu En Nesarudaiya Saththam! Idho, Avar Malaigalmel Kudhiththum Medugalmel Thulliyum Varugiraar.

9 en Nesar Velimaanukkum Maraikkuttikkum Oppaayirukkiraar; Idho, Avar Engal Madhilukkuppurambe Nindru, Palagani Vazhiyaaip Paarththu, Kiraadhiyin Vazhiyaaith Thamadhu Malarndha Mugaththaik Kaanbikkiraar.
10 en Nesar Ennode Pesi: En Piriyame! En Roobavadhiye! Ezhundhu Vaa.
12 boomiyile Pushpangal Kaanappadugiradhu Kuruvigal Paadunkaalam Vandhadhu, Kaattuppuraavin Saththam Dhesaththil Ketkappadugiradhu.
13 aththimaram Kaaikaaiththadhu; Dhraatchakkodigal Pooppooththu Vaasanaiyum Parimalikkiradhu; En Piriyame! En Roobavadhiye! Nee Ezhundhuvaa.

14 kanmalaiyin Vedippugalilum Sigarangalin Maraividangalilum Thangugira En Puraave! Un Muga Roobaththai Enakkuk Kaanbi, Un Saththaththai Naan Ketkattum; Un Saththam Inbamum Un Mugaroobam Azhagumaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
15 dhraatchaththottangalaik Kedukkira Kuzhinarigalaiyum Sirunarigalaiyum Namakkup Pidiyungal; Nammudaiya Dhraatchaththottangal Poovum Pinjumaayirukkiradhe.
16 en Nesar Ennudaiyavar, Naan Avarudaiyaval. Avar Leeli Pushpangalukkulle Meygiraar.
17 en Nesare! Pagal Kulirchchiyaagi, Nizhal Saaindhupogumvaraikkum, Neer Thirumbi, Kundrum Pilappumaana Kanmalaigalil Kudhiththuvarum Kalaimaanukkum Maraigalin Kuttikkum Samaanamaayirum.
